name: Heroku PHP Jelly Stack
description: Stupid fast semi-static PHP/HTML/JS website starter. Built-in tailwind dark mode, working dark mode toggle and GDPR compliant cookie consent. Leveraging the gargantuan Nodejs ecosystem for local development, tailwind for styling and PHP/HTML/JS for semi-static website generation. Deploy insanely fast with Heroku PHP Buildpack, PHP Composer, and a Procfile. Push changes near instantly by utiliziing Heroku's pipline feature and configuring automatic branch deployments. Compaitible with Heroku's free and paid dynos.
keywords: heroku, php jelly stack, php jelly, php, html, js, static, website, starter, tailwind, tailwindcss
